      • addCellToLastGroup

        public void addCellToLastGroup​(int row,
                               int col)
                        throws exceptions.TooManyOperandsException,
                               exceptions.CellAlreadyInGroupException
        Adds the cell of the given coordinates to the last group created
        Parameters:
        row - , defines the row of the KenKen to get the cell from
        col - , defines the column of the KenKen to get the cell from
        Throws:
        exceptions.TooManyOperandsException - when the operation accepts a limited number of operands (OperationDivision, OperationEquality, OperationPower, OperationSubtraction)
        exceptions.CellAlreadyInGroupException - when the cell is already part of a group

      • setFixedPosition

        public void setFixedPosition​(int row,
                             int col,
                             int value)
                      throws exceptions.ValueOutOfBoundsException
        Method to set a fixed value to a cell
        Parameters:
        row - , defines the row of the KenKen to get the cell from
        col - , defines the column of the KenKen to get the cell from
        value - , defines the number of the fixed value of the cell
        Throws:
        exceptions.ValueOutOfBoundsException - when the value is smaller than 1 or bigger than the KenKen size

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition​(int row,
                        int col,
                        int value)
                 throws exceptions.ValueOutOfBoundsException,
                        exceptions.RewriteFixedPositionException
        Parameters:
        row - , defines the row of the KenKen to get the cell from
        col - , defines the column of the KenKen to get the cell from
        value - , defines the number of the value to put on the cell
        Throws:
        exceptions.ValueOutOfBoundsException - when the value is smaller than 1 or bigger than the KenKen size
        exceptions.RewriteFixedPositionException - when trying to modify a position with a fixed value already set

      • checkCellsGroups

        public void checkCellsGroups()
                      throws exceptions.CellHasNoGroupException,
                             exceptions.GroupCellsNotContiguousException
        Method to check if all cells are assigned to a group and if all the groups fulfill with the KenKen rules
        Throws:
        exceptions.CellHasNoGroupException - when a cell is not assigned to a group
        exceptions.GroupCellsNotContiguousException - when a group contains one or more cells not contiguous

      • sameGroup

        public boolean sameGroup​(int row1,
                         int col1,
                         int row2,
                         int col2)
        Method to check if two cells are in the same group
        Parameters:
        row1 - , defines the row of the KenKen to get the first cell from
        col1 - , defines the column of the KenKen to get the first cell from
        row2 - , defines the row of the KenKen to get the second cell from
        col2 - , defines the column of the KenKen to get the second cell from
        Returns:
        true if they are in the same group and false if not

        col - , defines the column of the KenKen to get the cell from

      • check

        public boolean check()
              throws exceptions.OperandsDoNotMatchException,
                     exceptions.NonIntegerResultException
        Checks if the KenKen
        Returns:
        true if the KenKen fulfills the rules, false otherwise
        Throws:
        exceptions.OperandsDoNotMatchException - when the operands dont have the expected result
        exceptions.NonIntegerResultException - when the result or the operation is negative
